Services

Dedicated to showing all the options you and your family have for a fun day on the water in Panama City Beach! Answer a few simple questions and find options on what tours would best serve you and your parties needs!

Answer Some Questions

Answer Some Questions!

Dolphin Tours

The most personal and customizable of tours. Yet they can also be the most misunderstood charter in the area. Companies will try to get you to book with them by saying you are gauranteed to swim with dolphins, but that is not always possible. You are looking for wild animals in their natural habitat and a lot of different factors go into the outcome of your time in the water with the dolphins. Also keep in mind these are wild and untrained animals, so if the dolphins do not behave the way you want them to, do not be upest with your captain! Just enjoy the moment and salvage what you can from the experience.
Dolphin Tours

Fishing Charters

Panama City Beach has no shortage of options when it comes to fishing! We want to help you find the best fit for your party! Whether you know exactly what you want from your fishing trip or it is your first time and have no idea what to expect, let us help you get "hooked" up with a great charter!

Inshore Fishing

Fish the Beautiful Water of the well protected St. Andrews Bay

St. Andrews Bay is well known for its inshore fishing, whether you want to get out and target some nice redfish or take the kids on their first fishing adventure, these inshore fishing trips are a perfect way to spend a wonderful action packed day.

  • Date: January 2020
  • Client: Threads
  • Category: Illustration

Bottom Fishing

Get offshore and see whats swimming along the bottom of the Gulf!

Bottom trips are a great way to spend the day! Especially in the summer when the Red Snapper season opens up, but if its not Red Snapper season there are always plenty of other fish to be caught offshore! If you are interested in the bottom fishing trips make sure you also look at the information about Federaly Permitted Charters and State Permitted Charters on this page so you can have all the information you need to make the most informed choice!

  • Date: January 2020
  • Client: Explore
  • Category: Graphic Design

Trolling Trips

Relaxing and action filled all rolled into one!

Trolling trips are usually the shortest and cheapest option when chartering a fishing boat. But don't let the time and price fool you! When the bite is on you are sure to be worn out at the end of the trip and bring back a nice haul of fish! In the Spring and Fall charters will target the Spanish Mackeral and King Mackeral but you never know what you might hook into while you are out there!

  • Date: January 2020
  • Client: Finish
  • Category: Identity

Shark Fishing

From land or sea!

Shark fishing is typically done at night and can be done from a Charter Boat or from right off the beach! There are a few guides who offer their services and set up poles and bait and all you need right off the beach! Or you could ride out into the sunset on a Charter anchor the boat throw out the shark baits and do some bottom fishing while patiently waiting to hear the shark pole to get a bite!

  • Date: January 2020
  • Client: Lines
  • Category: Branding

Federaly Permitted

Go out further to deeper water!

Boats that have a federal permit are allowed to out past the nine mile state water line. Generally this means they are able to have more fishing spots that gives you a great chance to target bigger fish! So if you want that trophy fish usually a federally permitted boat is going to give you the best oppurtunity to do so!

  • Date: January 2020
  • Client: Southwest
  • Category: Website Design

State Water Charters

Stay within Nine Miles of Shore

State Water Charters have to stay within Nine Miles of the shore, but this is not a problem for the skilled captains and fishermen that Panama City Beach has to offer! Time and time again these boats come in with impressive catches! During peak fishing seasons it can just be a little congested and competitive within that nine-mile line!

  • Date: January 2020
  • Client: Window
  • Category: Photography

Dolphin Tours

Take your chances on swimming with wild Dolphins!

Panama City Beach is known for having one of the largest populations of Atlantic bottled nose dolphins and these tours give youu a chance to get into the water with them in their natural habitat!
